20110113020027.000|20110113020030.000|CC1|BATTLE.

20110113020033.000|20110113020035.000|CC1|TRAINING OR PHYSICAL STRENGTH.  
20110113020035.000|20110113020037.000|CC1|HEROISM IS HERE.

20110113020044.000|20110113020045.000|CC1|FELLOW CITIZENS JUST WAITING TO

20110113020101.000|20110113020108.000|CC1|TO EACH OF US.

20110113020124.000|20110113020128.000|CC1|HOW CAN WE BE TRUE TO THEIR     
20110113020128.000|20110113020132.000|CC1|MEMORY?                         
20110113020132.000|20110113020134.000|CC1|YOU SEE, WHEN A TRAGEDY LIKE    
20110113020134.000|20110113020139.000|CC1|THIS STRIKES, IT IS PART OF OUR 
20110113020139.000|20110113020142.000|CC1|NATURE TO DEMAND EXPLANATIONS.

20110113020155.000|20110113020157.000|CC1|NATIONAL CONVERSATION COMMENCED.
20110113020157.000|20110113020200.000|CC1|NOT ONLY ABOUT THE MOTIVATIONS  
20110113020200.000|20110113020202.000|CC1|BEHIND THESE KILLINGS, BUT ABOUT
20110113020202.000|20110113020204.000|CC1|EVERYTHING FROM THE MERITS OF   
20110113020204.000|20110113020206.000|CC1|GUN SAFETY LAWS TO THE ADEQUACY 
20110113020206.000|20110113020211.000|CC1|OF OUR MENTAL HEALTH SYSTEM.    
20110113020211.000|20110113020216.000|CC1|MUCH OF THIS PROCESS OF DEBATING
20110113020216.000|20110113020218.000|CC1|WHAT MIGHT BE DONE TO PREVENT   
20110113020218.000|20110113020222.000|CC1|SUCH TRAGEDIES IN THE FUTURE IS 
20110113020222.000|20110113020227.000|CC1|AN ESSENTIAL INGREDIENT IN OUR  
20110113020227.000|20110113020233.000|CC1|EXERCISE OF SELF-GOVERNMENT.    
20110113020233.000|20110113020235.000|CC1|AT A TIME WHEN OUR DISCOURSE HAS
20110113020235.000|20110113020241.000|CC1|BECOME SO SHARPLY POLARIZED, AT 
20110113020241.000|20110113020242.000|CC1|A TIME WHERE WE ARE FAR TOO     
20110113020242.000|20110113020244.000|CC1|EAGER TO LAY THE BLAME FOR ALL  
20110113020244.000|20110113020247.000|CC1|THAT AILS THE WORLD AT THE FEET 
20110113020247.000|20110113020250.000|CC1|OF THOSE WHO HAPPEN TO THINK    
20110113020250.000|20110113020257.000|CC1|DIFFERENTLY THAN WE U-HAUL --   
20110113020257.000|20110113020302.000|CC1|THAN WE DO, IT IS IMPORTANT TO  
20110113020302.000|20110113020303.000|CC1|PAUSE FOR A MOMENT AND MAKE SURE
20110113020303.000|20110113020305.000|CC1|WE ARE TALKING WITH EACH OTHER

20110113020309.000|20110113020312.000|CC1|NOT IN A WAY THAT WOUNDS.       
20110113020312.000|20110113020325.000|CC1|[APPLAUSE]                      
20110113020325.000|20110113020327.000|CC1|SCRIPT TELLS US THAT THERE IS   
20110113020327.000|20110113020329.000|CC1|EVIL IN THE WORLD.              
20110113020329.000|20110113020331.000|CC1|AND THAT TERRIBLE THINGS HAPPEN 
20110113020331.000|20110113020334.000|CC1|FOR REASONS THAT DEFY HUMAN     
20110113020334.000|20110113020337.000|CC1|UNDERSTANDING.

20110113020344.000|20110113020345.000|CC1|LOOKED FOR LIFE, THEN CAME      
20110113020345.000|20110113020347.000|CC1|DARKNESS.                       
20110113020347.000|20110113020349.000|CC1|BAD THINGS HAPPEN.              
20110113020349.000|20110113020352.000|CC1|WE HAVE TO GUARD AGAINST SIMPLE 
20110113020352.000|20110113020354.000|CC1|EXPLANATIONS IN THE AFTERMATH.

20110113020357.000|20110113020358.000|CC1|KNOW EXACTLY WHAT TRIGGERED THIS

20110113020410.000|20110113020412.000|CC1|INNER RECESSES OF A VIOLENT

20110113020417.000|20110113020421.000|CC1|WE HAVE TO EXAMINE ALL OF THE

20110113020422.000|20110113020425.000|CC1|WE CANNOT AND WILL NOT BE

20110113020524.000|20110113020526.000|CC1|AS WE DISCUSSED THESE ISSUES,   
20110113020526.000|20110113020528.000|CC1|LET EACH OF US DO SO WITH A GOOD
20110113020528.000|20110113020531.000|CC1|DOSE OF HUMILITY.

20110113020549.000|20110113020551.000|CC1|THE FEET.

20110113020553.000|20110113020555.000|CC1|WAYS THAT OUR HOPES AND DREAMS

20110113020607.000|20110113020609.000|CC1|US DO WHEN WE LOSE SOMEBODY IN  
20110113020609.000|20110113020612.000|CC1|OUR FAMILY.

20110113020613.000|20110113020616.000|CC1|UNEXPECTED.

20110113020625.000|20110113020629.000|CC1|WE REFLECT ON THE PAST AND WE   
20110113020629.000|20110113020635.000|CC1|SPEND ENOUGH TIME WITH AN AGENT.
20110113020635.000|20110113020637.000|CC1|DID WE EXPRESS OUR GRATITUDE    
20110113020637.000|20110113020638.000|CC1|FROM THE SACRIFICES THAT THEY   
20110113020638.000|20110113020640.000|CC1|MADE FOR US.                    
20110113020640.000|20110113020644.000|CC1|DID WE TELL A SPOUSE JUST HOW   
20110113020644.000|20110113020646.000|CC1|DESPERATELY WE LOVE THEM?       
20110113020646.000|20110113020649.000|CC1|NOT JUST ONCE IN AWHILE, BUT    
20110113020649.000|20110113020654.000|CC1|EVERY SINGLE DAY?

20110113020658.000|20110113020700.000|CC1|TO LOOK FORWARD.

20110113020757.000|20110113020759.000|CC1|FLEETING TIME WE HAVE ON THIS   
20110113020759.000|20110113020802.000|CC1|EARTH, WHAT MATTERS IS NOT

20110113020804.000|20110113020810.000|CC1|FAME, BUT HOW WELL WE HAVE      
20110113020810.000|20110113020811.000|CC1|LOVED.

20110113020815.000|20110113020818.000|CC1|OTHER PEOPLE BETTER.

20110113021433.000|20110113021437.000|CC1|THAT IS WHAT I BELIEVE.         
20110113021437.000|20110113021439.000|CC1|IN PART BECAUSE THAT IS WHAT A
